Firedrill snickered as Beachcomber could only smile. He brought his hand
up to the back of his neck joint, and rubbed it gently. He then began a
bit unsure, "Well repairing isn't my speacialty, i'm a scientist." He
then looked up, a bit more perky, "Besides, you don't look like any
Cybertronian I've ever seen." he adds jokingly.

Firedrill pondered the question for a bit, as he kneeled against a
larger rock, folding his arms, as his eyes went through a couple years
of data. "Well, he was present with a few other autobots at my creation,
and he promised my security instructors that I would be okay on this
field mission. I guess, you could say he's been like an older brother to
me." He turned his gentle eyes to Redhot. "I've been through a lot with
Beachcomber and Cliffjumper." he said, motioning his head towards
Beachcomber to show he was there.
